thread.title: Slimmer Peay signs with ABA New England team
thread.title_full: Slimmer Peay signs with ABA New England team

title: Slimmer Peay signs with ABA New England team
text:
Slimmer Peay signs with ABA New England team 
Updated: 
Posted by: Jason Bristol 
HARRISBURG -- Less is more for basketball player Josiah Peay. 
Peay, who now lives in the Harrisburg area, tells CBS 21 News he has signed with the New England Anchors of the American Basketball Association. 
Peay, a native of New York, has dropped around 50 pounds in the past seven months and says he's in the best shape of his life. 
He was named second team All-Eastern Basketball Alliance last season after averaging 14 points and 9 rebounds for the Harrisburg Horizon. 
He leaves next week for Providence, Rhode Island, home of the Anchors. 
Peay played his college basketball at Maine. Related Stories
